title: Open Invitation
description: HE WAS EVERY WOMAN'S FANTASYAnd to her annoyance, Amanda Butterworth found herself drooling over Kyle Fox, too. Not that she'd let him see that. They were cohosting a TV show --- she didn't intend to partner him in any other activity. Especially not when the man considered her a prude, both on and off the air. Amanda considered him dangerous, with his lean, mean body, his sexy slouch and his lustful looks. But uptight she wasn't and she was ready to prove it.What better way than with naughty suggestions by mail, naughty enough to drive him wild? No doubt he was used to making all the moves with women, but even the great Kyle Fox might appreciate being outrageously seduced himself ...
author: Tiffany White
